rules_text:
Trample
[i]Rage Inducing[/i] – Whenever you or a permanent you control is dealt damage, put a boil counter onto Panette, Unforgiving Doll.
[i]Wrath Incarnate[/i] – Whenever Panette attacks or leaves the battlefield, she deals damage to target opponent equal to the number of boil counters on her.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {2}{R}{W}
